question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-file-checker/src/processor.rs] [Function: run()] [Serialization failure] If serde_json::to_vec() fails on line 102 due to malformed progress_file, does the system skip the update or panic, potentially losing progress? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-file-checker/src/processor.rs] [Function: run()] [Timestamp manipulation] The last_update_time on line 114 is reset after successful upload - can an attacker cause repeated upload attempts by corrupting the bucket, wasting resources? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-file-checker/src/processor.rs] [Function: download_raw_file()] [Resource exhaustion] Does client.object().download() on line 171 have timeouts? Can an attacker cause the bucket to serve extremely slowly, hanging the checker indefinitely? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-file-checker/src/processor.rs] [Function: download_raw_file()] [Information disclosure] The error message on lines 178-181 exposes internal error details - does this leak bucket structure or access patterns to attackers? (Low)
